document_data.name: ''Ring of Research''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of research''''' was a [[magic]] [[ring]] that aided the wearer when conducting research.
document_data.Description: These rings were made from [[gold]] or [[silver]] and were fixed with a single [[gemstone]].
document_data.Powers: When worn, a ''ring of research'' allowed its wearer to quickly find the correct page in a [[book]], or place on a [[scroll]], where the answer to their question could be found provided they had access to a sufficient library that contained the knowledge they sought.
